name: sbr-generator
description: Spring Boot Rest Generator is a  python Library used to generate source code modules starting from config files . The Generated source code is a CRUD Rest Spring Boot Server.

scripts.testFullBuildNoTests: npm run exampleFullNoTests && npm run BuildNoTests
scripts.testMinBuildNoTests: npm run exampleMinNoTests && npm run BuildNoTests
scripts.testMinBuildAndDoTests: npm run exampleMin && npm run BuildAndDoTests
scripts.testFullBuildAndDoTests: npm run exampleFull && npm run BuildAndDoTests
scripts.test: npm run buildTemplates && npm run testFullBuildNoTests && npm run testMinBuildNoTests && npm run testMinBuildAndDoTests && npm run testFullBuildAndDoTests

author: Mohamed Azzouni <mohamed.azzouni@gmail.com>
